definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: live (NH Ph. id.; Ar. h.ay=a, h.ayiya; Sab. [[חיו]] Mordt:ZMG 1876, 28; Eth h.aywa: Aram. h.yo0, [[חֲיׇא]]; Palm. [[חיי]] life, life-time, Vog:32, 74)—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: have life, Ge 31:32 (E), Ex 33:20 (J), Nu 4:19 (P), De 30:16 +; also in phrase [[וַיְחִי]] and he lived (so many years) with acc. of time, Ge 5:3-30 (16 t.) Ge 9:28, Ge 11:11-26 (14 t.) Ge 47:28 (all P), Ge 50:22 (E), 2Ki 14:17 = 2Ch 25:25, Job 42:16.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: continue in life, remain alive Ge 20:7 (E), Le 25:36, 2Sa 12:22 +; also † [[נפשׁ]] ´[[ח]] live, of the soul or the self Ge 12:13, Ge 19:20 (J), 1Ki 20:32, Ps 119:175, Je 38:2, Je 38:17, Je 38:20, Is 55:3; [[זְחַי הַיׇּ֑לֶד]] and the boy may live 2Sa 12:22; † [[לִפְנֵי]] ´[[ח]] live in the presence of Ge 17:18 (P) Ho 6:2; † ´[[ב]] ´[[ח]] live among La 4:20. †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: sustain life, live on or upon ([[על]]), of the animal life, by the sword Ge 27:40 (J), by bread De 8:3; elsewh. in pregnant sense of fulness of life in divine favour, sustained by ([[על]]) everything that issueth out of the mouth of ´[[י]] De 8:3; his promises (?) Is 38:16; of wicked man, by repentance Ez Eze 33:19; c. [[בְּ]] by the statutes and judgments of ´[[י]] if a man do them, Le 18:5 (H) Ez Eze 20:11, Eze 20:13, Eze 20:21, Eze 20:25, Ne 9:29; [[חַדִּיק בֶּאֱמוּנׇתוֹ יִחְיֶה]] a righteous man by his faithfulness shall live Hb Hab 2:4. †

definitions.title: d.
